data.title: Vax for the Win
data.author: Peggy Gartin
data.excerpt: Vax for the Win Californiaâ€™s vaccine incentive program Get vaccinated, get rewarded We’ve already awarded millions of dollars in prizes and perks to vaccinated Californians, but we’re not done yet. Get vaccinated and you could win one of 6 California dream vacations! No matter when you were vaccinated, you’re automatically entered. Ready to win but […]
